001.name: Ferry
001.text: Yo yo yo !!! Look who it is. The superman !!!

002.name: Rega
002.text: Ha ha ha. Your joke is very funny.

004.name: Ferry
004.text: Ho ho ho, don't be too serious, man. I'm good.

005.name: Ferry
005.text: How are you then? Have this pandemic give any effect to you?

006.name: Rega
006.text: No, i'm still in good condition.

007.name: Rega
007.text: Any news about this problem? I've watched the news yesterday and today.

008.name: Rega
008.text: I'm just... a little bit curious about it.

009.name: Ferry
009.text: Oh, really? I don't think you're curious about this thing.

010.name: Ferry
010.text: I think you're being disturbed by it because your holiday plan to go to the beach is ruined. Am i correct?

012.name: Rega
012.text: Yeah yeah, whatever you want to say.

013.name: Rega
013.text: Now, do you've any news or not?                (starting to lose patience)

014.name: Ferry
014.text: Hey, chill out, bro. I'm sorry okay.

016.name: Ferry
016.text: As you can see, the goverment didn't say much to the media. So, i think they're trying to hide something.

017.name: Ferry
017.text: There're some rumours about it, like aliens, world war, bio-terorism, or may be the end will be coming?

018.name: Rega
018.text: Hah? What trash information is that?

019.name: Rega
019.text: I don't believe about that cheap rumours.

020.name: Rega
020.text: Hmmm.... I think this pandemic have something to do with the city lab.

021.name: Ferry
021.text: Oh, you mean the city lab that located in the north of this city?

022.name: Ferry
022.text: It was built and finished two months ago. How can that be related to this pandemic?

023.name: Rega
023.text: I don't know. I'm just following my insting. Hahaha.

024.name: Rega
024.text: Can you find some information about it?

026.name: Ferry
026.text: I can't promise you, but i'll try because you got some point on it.

027.name: Rega
027.text: Hahaha, okay then. I'll wait for your good news.

028.name: Ferry
028.text: Before you leave, i have some task for you, i need you to get fresh ingredients for me from Jorjio's Farm.

030.name: Ferry
030.text: I'm serious, hahaha. Just help me for the sake of information, okay?

031.name: Rega
031.text: Alright then!! I hope when i get back, your information will be usefull.          (Grumpy Face)

032.name: Ferry
032.text: Thanks and no problem, Pal.                    (Smile Happily)

033.name: Rega
033.text: Okay then, now let's go to Jorjio's Farm in the far east of this city to collect the item.
